english: This trip is the most fun! So...tonight when James plays guitar, who is going to sing?
thai: maa thîiao khráng níi sà-nùk thîi-sùt looei. ôoe...wâa dtàae khuuen níi dtaawn jeem lên gii-dtâa khrai jà ráawng phleeng já.
bpôen ráawng phleeng dâai mǎi khráp.

english: I can sing, but Phueng can sing better.
thai: ráawng dâai khâ. dtàae phûeng ráawng gèng gwàa.

english: Which singer do you like most?
thai: bpôen châawp nák-ráawng khon nǎi thîi-sùt khráp.

english: I like Bird the best. How about you?
thai: châawp phîi bòoet thîi-sùt khâ. láaeo jeem lâ khá.

english: I like Sek Loso the best because he can play the guitar really well.
thai: phǒm châawp sèk loo-soo mâak thîi-sùt khráp. phráw khǎo lên gii-dtâa gèng.

english: James, what is the Colorado River like?
thai: jeem mâae-náam khoo-loo-raa-dôo bpen yang-ngai rǒoe khráp.

english: It's wider and faster than the Pai River.
thai: gwâang gwàa láe reo gwàa mâae-náam bpaai khráp.
nâa-gluua gwàa dûuai châi mǎi khá.

english: Yes. it isn't scary at all here.
thai: châi khráp. thîi níi mâi nâa-gluua looei.

english: He is the tallest person in the school
thai: khǎo bpen khon thîi sǔung thîi-sùt nai roong-riian

english: Nit's house is the farthest away out of all my friends
thai: bâan khǎawng phîi nít yùu glai thîi-sùt nai phûuak phûuean khǎawng chǎn

english: The Nile River is the longest river in the world
thai: mâae-náam nai bpen mâae-náam thîi yaao thîi-sùt nai lôok

english: What food do you like the most?
thai: khun châawp aa-hǎan à-rai mâak thîi-sùt
